name: Rebots Playground
description:
Rebots is a first-person simulation adventure game where you climaform planets in your galaxy to suit picky aliens. Fly between asteroids and planets with your crew of (mostly) intelligent robots, exploring ecosystems of wacky plants and animals.

Main Features
  • Experience a galactic adventure with your crew of robots
  • Program robots
  • Build and balance delicate ecosystems
  • Build relationships with the alien factions you meet
  • Solve challenges in unique ways
What to expect from Rebots Playground?

We are currently developing Rebots and making prototypes along the way and we would like to share work in progress prototypes and builds here on Itch! So we called this project Rebots Playground!

If you played us and want to give feedback, come join us on our Discord to get involved  - https://discord.gg/ZVVZQyB

Thank you for helping us design a great game!

 - Rebots Devs / @FlatPonies
